name: Compile JOSS paper

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  paper:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Compile paper
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Compile paper
        uses: openjournals/openjournals-draft-action@master
        with:
          journal: joss
          paper-path: paper/paper.md
